sourcesContent:
import styles from './orderSummary.module.css'; const OrderSummary = ({order}) => { return (
{order.name.first}
{order.name.last}
#{order.order_id}
{order.products.map((product, i) =>
{product.price}EGP x{product.quantity || 1}
{product.name}
)}
Total
{order.total} EGP
); } export default OrderSummary;
